alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 12:56AM CDT until March 26 at 7:40AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Gasconade River at Hazelgreen affecting Laclede County. .Heavy rainfall in the upper portion of the Gasconade River Basin will likely lead to rises around flood stage at Hazelgreen. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Hazelgreen. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, minor flooding begins at the gage site and mainly affects low lying areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 21.1 feet early tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
